text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
    <SELLER>
        <NAME>Daniel Haag</NAME>
        <OCCUPATION>Buchbinder</OCCUPATION>
    </SELLER>
    <TEXT>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen:</TEXT>

    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>2 fl. 24 kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebetbuch</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT>
        <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
        <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
        <PRICE type="ohngebunden">46 kr.</PRICE>
        <PRICE type="gebunden">1 fl. 10 kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
        <PRICE type="ohngebunden">6 Batzen</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <BIBL>
        <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
        <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>6 kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>12 Batzen</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
        <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
        <PRICE>18 kr.</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmern welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
        <PRICE>8 Rappen</PRICE>
    </BIBL>

    <NOTE>…und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</NOTE>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"The original string was not well-formed XML. Main fixes: (1) closed all prematurely open <BIBL> elements and removed illegal nesting; (2) converted the inconsistent <PRIZE>/<PRICE> usage to one unified <PRICE> tag and removed trailing punctuation from inside tags; (3) added <SELLER>, <TEXT> and <NOTE> wrappers so that stray prose is properly contained; (4) created two <PRICE> tags with a type attribute to distinguish bindings; (5) normalised malformed encodings (gro√ü→groß, 8v√≤→8vo, etc.); (6) removed stray control characters (†‡); (7) ensured every element now has both an opening and closing tag; (8) replaced comma/semicolon after prices with plain text outside the tag. Altogether 12 distinct structural/encoding corrections were necessary to obtain well-formed, readable XML."}

parsed.explanation: The original string was not well-formed XML. Main fixes: (1) closed all prematurely open <BIBL> elements and removed illegal nesting; (2) converted the inconsistent <PRIZE>/<PRICE> usage to one unified <PRICE> tag and removed trailing punctuation from inside tags; (3) added <SELLER>, <TEXT> and <NOTE> wrappers so that stray prose is properly contained; (4) created two <PRICE> tags with a type attribute to distinguish bindings; (5) normalised malformed encodings (gro√ü→groß, 8v√≤→8vo, etc.); (6) removed stray control characters (†‡); (7) ensured every element now has both an opening and closing tag; (8) replaced comma/semicolon after prices with plain text outside the tag. Altogether 12 distinct structural/encoding corrections were necessary to obtain well-formed, readable XML.
